name: sistema-tickets
description: Sistema de abertura e acompanhamento de chamados

scripts.build: npm run minify-js && npm run minify-css
scripts.minify-js: uglifyjs src/script.js -o dist/assets/js/script.min.js && uglifyjs src/admin.js -o dist/assets/js/admin.min.js && uglifyjs src/database.js -o dist/assets/js/database.min.js
